entry.summary: ...Very Hot Over The Eastern Interior Through Monday... ...High Water On The Tanana River Into Next Week... entry.summary: ...GUSTY WINDS AND DRY CONDITIONS MONDAY... .A cold front will approach Monday afternoon and sweep through Monday night.
